segments.text: It doesn't look very nice outside today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're right . I think it's going to rain later .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In the middle of the summer , it shouldn't be raining .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Considering that it's over ninety degrees outside , that would be weird .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Exactly , it wouldn't be nice if it started raining . It's too hot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wish it would cool off one day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's how I feel , I want winter to come soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I enjoy the winter , but it gets really cold sometimes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know what you mean , but I'd rather be cold than hot .
segments.speaker: S1
